website_summaries.verdict: Highly popular electric skateboard with 125-watt motor.
pros: Recognized for its excellent control when riding and turning

website_summaries.verdict: Quality, durable electric skateboard from a trusted company great for youngsters.
pros: Stylish: made for fun and transportation
Can reach up to 10 mph and cruise on the battery for 40 minutes
Lightweight design and extra strong grip
cons: It's expensive, but you get top quality for the high-end price

customer_reviews.title: WARNING! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This skateboard was nice for the whole week it worked. It suddenly wouldn't turn on after charging. Spoke with customer service and they told me to re-pair the remote. Not possible if it won't turn on. Ordered a replacement through Amazon, and had the exact same problem. My son is extremely disappointed. He saved his money and spent it on a product that does not work.
customer_reviews.author: John R

customer_reviews.title: which worked fine the first two weeks
customer_reviews.text: This product was returned bc the battery would not hold a charge, and soon quit charging at all. We were sent a new one, which worked fine the first two weeks, however we began having the same issues that we had with the first one. We returned it for a full refund and will look for a different brand next time. I am extremely disappointed with this Razor product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just right for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this board to learn, and it is perfect for that. Very stable, runs for about an hour on one charge and 10mph is plenty fast for a beginner. For my surprise it ran up a decent size ramp (I'm 160lb) but eats battery like crazy uphill. All and all I couldn't be happier. For the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gusztav Rozsa

customer_reviews.title: Poor Battery Life (Quality)
customer_reviews.text: This board rode well for a toy but now the battery doesn't hold any charge. I bought it on sale but honestly I am returning it and spending an extra buck on a better one. Also, the quality of the board itself is poor. Perfect $90 (must buy warranty because board will break) present to a kid. Goes over most uneven terrain very well and it feels safe riding it.
customer_reviews.author: OmegaN

customer_reviews.title: The only annoying part is the motor is loud
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend as a christmas gift. He loves it. The only annoying part is the motor is loud. More like a high pitch sort of sound. But other than that he likes to ride it to the park and over to my place.
customer_reviews.author: uyen do

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this as a toy. It goes about 9-10 mph that is really slow. I suggest this for a child between 5-9 yrs old. Well built product and we had no issues with any of the mechanics. The motor sounds kinda loud though so you can hear it going up and down the street.
customer_reviews.author: 75vtec

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Currently in pieces on my porch. Stopped working and my son decided to try and fix it himself.
customer_reviews.author: Justin LaFountain

customer_reviews.title: Fun and fast
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 18 year old daughter, we works 2 miles away, and she was riding her penny board to work, and was exhausted when she gets there and even more when she come home. But with is new motorized board, its fun and get her to work in a few minutes. (so she tells me) battery last a long time on a single charge. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: rubrobles

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 days before stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Ordered June 2020. Received skateboard manufactured in 2017. The skateboard stopped working after 3 days of use! Would no longer pair. Razor says it is a bad battery. Waiting for warranty replacement battery.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed in this product. Very loud motor and does not even go up the slightest hill for my husband who only weighs 165. Works ok on flat ground but so does any other standard skateboard. I bought it about 3 weeks ago for Father's Day and upon opening and trying it out for all of 10 minutes after it was fully charged, he asked me if we could take it back...only to find out that the return time frame expired. Super unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Steve and Denise

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: This item Brooke after using it about five times. I got the warranty so I'll see what it is it's covered and will update if any further issues. Loud when in use, not sure if it was usually for this product. Would not buy again. Constantly needing charged. Charger came broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun Ride
customer_reviews.text: The Razor X skateboard is a great source of fun for my 12 year old. It is an interesting contrast to the traditional skateboard and works wonderfully. Easy to get used to and doesn't go too fast, but fast enough. Highly recommend. Very durable, but not recommended for heavier adults because the motor is not as powerful as the much more expensive electric boards.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: We have had the skateboard for less than two weeks. It has been used moderately and carefully in that time. However one of the wheels has already stopped working due to two broken gears. So the skateboard is unusable. I emailed RAZOR and have not heard back yet. Regardless this should not have happened after such a short time. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Yates

customer_reviews.title: BROKE AFTER 1 WEEK
customer_reviews.text: Broke within the first week of using it. Battery won't turn on, but says full charge when plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: T. Phan

customer_reviews.title: Old technology jerky start makes kids fall off!
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe razor a big brand puts there name on this. The deck has no curves or layers for flex just a piece of wood cutout in the shape of a skateboard. Then the kick start is Soo jerky when it starts my son falls off and same with all of his friends. Now for me a adult of adults weight and years of skateboard ing experience I can do it but the trucks are not great. All around if ur over a hundred pounds it's ok under that do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan P.

customer_reviews.title: We live in Florida so it is flat here and the board has been working great since Christmas
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old son loves this board. A Boosted board which he rode with my brother was not in the budget for Christmas so I took a chance on this one after reading a review. We live in Florida so it is flat here and the board has been working great since Christmas. It does not go backwards, just breaks if you push the remote backwards. I would definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that this product arrived with a shot battery in both board and remote. Can't use this for another one too two weeks, until I get a new battery, and I don't even know if it will work afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Finch

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous braking
customer_reviews.text: Initially liked it, it's portable and works. The danger is with the remote control, over time I've found the braking doesn't always engage, making this fairly dangerous. EDIT Now it doesn't turn on at all. Support is non-existent. It lasted ~20 rides
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works when used as directed.
customer_reviews.text: Kept it charged, anyways charged it for eight hours before use, still works great. Haven't had any problems with mine, but used as directed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Simpson

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend loved it but the problem is you have to get ...
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loved it but the problem is you have to get the skateboard to move first before the remote works. I wish you could use the remote more efficiently
customer_reviews.author: skinnybrokefabulous

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for a first timer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our 9 year old who isn’t great at skateboarding but it is working out well. He loves it and is picking it up quickly. UPDATE** We're into March now. The skateboard has very little wear on it. because the battery doesn't hold a charge at all. I'm gonna reach out to Razer and see what they will honor as a Warranty issue.
customer_reviews.author: MC Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life & poor customer support
customer_reviews.text: Poor battery life & poor customer support, I've tried reaching the Razor customer service and also left an email to them, but they never responded.
customer_reviews.author: Karthik

customer_reviews.title: Battery only lasted 6 charge cycles
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved the board, but the battery does not hold up and board will not turn on once battery gives out. Took less than 4 days to get to this point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slow, loud, and faulty
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as a Christmas gift and he absolutely loved it...when he opened it. But when he actually used it, he was quickly disappointed. The skateboard is really loud. People could hear it from around the corner, across the block, and through the woods. Additionally, this thing barely crawled by. It had no speed whatsoever. Finally, after using it for 3 days, the motor locked up and stopped working. All in all, a complete bust.
customer_reviews.author: G. Banker

customer_reviews.title: Great for a teenager.
customer_reviews.text: Our 13 year old loves it so far! It actually runs pretty quick. I’m hoping the battery lasts. As the weather gets warmer I’m sure he will be using it more.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: The noise
customer_reviews.text: It literally sounded like a dying dolphin, and it was soooo loud. People 300-500 ft away would turn around because of the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Gella Day

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but powerful!
customer_reviews.text: The product is relatively cheap compared to other brands, but it is powerful and I am 210lb, the battery can hold for 20+ mins
customer_reviews.author: Zhili Wei

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Skateboard!
customer_reviews.text: Very Good Skateboard! Perfect for children between the ages of 10-15. The only problem was that the bottom black paper would sometimes open up as the glue isn’t as tough. But ofher than that, everything is perfecf!
customer_reviews.author: Nick M

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Razor has got to start making better products. My sons skateboard broke within days of riding it for the first time. Took very good care of it! He saved to buy this and lost every penny spent. Razor is poor quality especially when it comes to charging ports and batteries. I wish I could get his money back for him.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: extremely loud and doesnt hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: I do not like my product. its extremely loud and does not hold a charge for very long. I have to constantly keep it on the charger when its not in use. Awful quality do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: DDR

customer_reviews.title: Extremely loud & only runs for 15/20 minutes per full charge!
customer_reviews.text: I got this electric board for my daughter who’s 14 for Christmas. She doesn’t use it very much, the battery only lasts for about 15/20 minutes and this board is really LOUD, I mean I can literally hear her coming home from blocks away, she says it’s really embarrassing.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie A

customer_reviews.title: Hard to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Hard to turn and lean back and forth. Too strurdy
customer_reviews.author: Long Distance Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Board is not reliable!
customer_reviews.text: The board was great for the first 2 days I received it, however after that it was a complete waste of money. The board is slow and loud. I will just buy a riptide board or a boosted board.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Robles

customer_reviews.title: Great for walking up hill as exercise
customer_reviews.text: Use it to slowly travel down hill (rather than walking). Great for walking up hill as exercise, and breaking to get back downhill while taking an exercise break. On flat, it's not fast, and pretty loud always. But great for the 80bucks I paid.
customer_reviews.author: FXP

customer_reviews.title: Electric skateboard
customer_reviews.text: I had bought another one, which was upgraded. Now it not working. Just like the others I have purchased. Works for a little bit. Then it stopped. What should I do?
customer_reviews.author: DonnaMarie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Buy yourself one as well.
customer_reviews.text: gift for grandson and he loves it, a smile on his face when he passes by.
customer_reviews.author: S Duvall

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: I do not ride this board often. However this board has been solid. Gets more range than my team gee h9 after 170 miles. Goes way slower though.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan rowland

customer_reviews.title: Teenage son loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teenage son for Christmas and he absolutely loves it. The remote looks cheap but at this price I won't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great present for 10 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Good compromise between value and price. My 10 year old was using this like a natural in a few hours. I’ve driven this electric skateboard to the local store ~ 1mile each way without any problems. Goes ~10mph with is plenty fast for kids and some adults!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love  razor products.
customer_reviews.text: Grand daughter loved it! She has been riding razor since age 5 now 14 running out of things to get, waiting for something new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: works as advertised but the battery life is terrible. 1 can go around my block 3x before the battery is dead.
customer_reviews.author: billgod

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: The first one we had died after a month so we got a replacement. The replacement died after a month as well.
customer_reviews.author: Linzie

customer_reviews.title: Stops working
customer_reviews.text: My son received the skateboard for Christmas & loved it! However, less than a week later it stopped working! It would say it’s fully charged but would not operate. Returned it & replaced it for another which only lasted 2 days and started have the same issue! Decided to return for a refund! Would have been a great product if not defective!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a basic electric scooter
customer_reviews.text: Good price for a basic electric scooter. Goes fast. Battery runs out quick so not a great commuter but it gets my daughter across campus.
customer_reviews.author: Michell Mouton

customer_reviews.title: My skateboard shows full charge, but it can't turn ...
customer_reviews.text: My skateboard shows full charge, but it can't turn on when I remove the charging line. I have used it for 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: ChaoYuan

customer_reviews.title: Cool Toy
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my 15 year old son. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really fun to ride
customer_reviews.text: Really fun to ride. Fast enough for smaller kids and for adults it may be a little slow. I also like the brake feature to slow you down.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Razor Skateboard and the battery pack went down after about a month of usage. The green light said battery was fully charged but wouldn’t do anything. I got a replacement board but the exact same thing happened again. China battery pack. Don’t waste you money on a Razor.
customer_reviews.author: Okie

customer_reviews.title: Died after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the other reviews on this thing. It completely died and stopped taking charges after 6 months exactly. Not a great product.
customer_reviews.author: MEGAMOVIELORD

customer_reviews.title: Great gift...very noisy
customer_reviews.text: It’s extremely loud...fun for my son, but makes a LOT of noise.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Kosecki

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this skateboard and used it a few times. I liked it and the speed, but after two weeks it wouldn't turn on anymore or charge. I thought it was the batteries of the remote, but it wasn't. It just stopped charging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's not as fast as my son would like and he's only 90 pounds
customer_reviews.text: It's not as fast as my son would like and he's only 90 pounds. It's also a bit loud!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Powers

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality, doesn’t turn on just after 7 days of purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this, waste of money. Doesn’t start after just 7 days. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: sangeetkatwal

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: We have had this a few days. For the price it is a great product and we bought it at $149. If I had gotten it at the sale price it would have been stars.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: Board only worked for 3 weeks then it didn't come on anymore I don't recommend this board and I don't recommend ordering anything from Everything Everything they act like they didn't care
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its bad
customer_reviews.text: when i bought this product i assumed it will be durable but it ain't. its a really small skateboard and its not very comfy to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: fm

customer_reviews.title: It’s no good
customer_reviews.text: Only used one day and battery died , haven’t been able to recharge or use since
customer_reviews.author: Mern

customer_reviews.title: Only got 3 months of use before it stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: It’s already broken. It has stopped working. Wasn’t even used much.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Lilley

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed little boy
customer_reviews.text: After ordering two and both breaking after one day, I returned two! Very disappointed little boy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product didn't last more than a month before the ...
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't last more than a month before the motor broke and it doesn't even turn on anymore even if I charge it fully and the wheels got wrecked after just a few rides!Don't buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Randi France

customer_reviews.title: Save your money for something better
customer_reviews.text: Three weeks in using it. Completely stops charging. Fun skateboard. Got me places. But short lived. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Trejo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bad
customer_reviews.text: at first it was great but after two weeks it would turn off by itself and the brakes wouldn't work
customer_reviews.author: Damian castanon hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Gets my daughter out of the house, and the rest of us too! She even doesn’t mind wearing pads and a helmet since she had a few falls on her skateboards before!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Speed is a issue
customer_reviews.text: It goes way too slow uphill like might as well walk but other then that its a pretty good skateboard i love it no other problems
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like that it couldn’t go up hills and go that fast and can’t go 10 miles on a single charge
customer_reviews.author: Martin cruz

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery
customer_reviews.text: The battery failed two weeks into the purchase. At 100 each they cost as much as the board. Excessive slow charge sucks too.
customer_reviews.author: Razorfail

customer_reviews.title: Het the 200.00 dollar one. Best money spent.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. Battery is a huge issue lasted 1 week.
customer_reviews.author: jaime cerna

customer_reviews.title: Worked for one day.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 year old son for Christmas, it worked for one day and will not even turn on anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy S.

customer_reviews.title: I mean i guess
customer_reviews.text: Its not the fastest board but it gets me from a parking lot to my school a half mile away with no problem. The size is nice for easy carry
customer_reviews.author: olmar

customer_reviews.title: Its worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love it it has a good price its perfect but my only problem is the battery life if it had a longer battery it would be the best one on the market for that end for a perfect price

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, it stopped working a week after using it. It never went 10mph. Very slow and too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Victoriano

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. You need a little push to get it going. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: debbie crapia

customer_reviews.title: Only last 10min
customer_reviews.text: Battery doesn't last long and the speed is lower than was told and very noisy. Plus, only works in straight ground
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Maranca

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product does not a single charge even after numerous attempts to recharge. Will be sending back shortly.

customer_reviews.title: It worked great in the beginning and my 14 yo loved it
customer_reviews.text: It worked great in the beginning and my 14 yo loved it. But it only lasted about 2 months very upset

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked out as a great introductory electric Skateboard for my Cousins
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Lamoreaux

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk broke in a week won't hold a charge won't buy again

customer_reviews.title: Its the best.
customer_reviews.text: I recommend it because it is fun for my child.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Now all 5 grandkids and some aunties want great set up
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sims

customer_reviews.title: My son is very disappointed. I tried to contact the seller for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived defective. Did not turn on despite multiple attempts. My son is very disappointed. I tried to contact the seller for a replacement but heard nothing at all. This is horrible customer service and I definitely do NOT recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Goes really fast! Would have waited until he was 12 or older
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Is okay but gets slow after a few days. Battery dies often & tbh if I had not used it all the first week, I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Boiiiiiiiiii

customer_reviews.title: Best fun for adaults
customer_reviews.text: Wow... Haven't ridden a skateboard for years. I did fall once. No pain No gain. Great fun. Goes fast. Love the brake feature.
customer_reviews.author: Rjshaft

customer_reviews.title: Buy if u don't mind sound of loud motors
customer_reviews.text: Nice speed but the motor is really loud. Neighbors can hear motor from afar
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Poor batter life
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 60 days and the battery will not hold a charge. Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Kozak

customer_reviews.title: Super noisy as well
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 and after 3 days they wouldn't hold a charge. Both had to go back with the same problem. Also you have to charge it for 8 hours when you get it. Super noisy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Big Steve

customer_reviews.title: Save your money or better yet, invest in a better quality skateboard
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this board. In my experience, it worked the first day I got it, no problem. The next day, it does not because it refuses to turn on even after charging it overnight. Plus, traveling 10 mph is not even fast. Save your money or better yet, invest in a better quality skateboard.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrell Richu

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It shorted after one time use 40 minutes it lasted as specified but goes to slow does not always turn back on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stoked
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was already put together when I pulled it out of the box. It was already charged. An it is fun to ride.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

product_meta.title: RazorX Cruiser Electric Skateboard
product_meta.description: Put fun on cruise with the lithium-ion-powered electric skateboard made to zoom! The new RazorX Cruiser is a skateboard with an electrifying kick, putting the control of a 125-watt, geared motor in the palm of your hand and under your feet. This complete Cruiser uses an innovative geared, rear-wheel drive and lithium-ion battery to deliver electrifying skate action at speeds up to 10 mph (16 km/h) for up to 40 minutes of continuous use. Hit your perfect cruising velocity with the variable-speed control on the wireless, digital, hand-held remote, and then lean into the lithium-ion-powered carve-and-turn action. The 29.7" (754 mm) long, 5-ply maple deck and custom reverse kingpin trucks deliver a smooth, responsive ride, while perforated grip tape and ground-gripping urethane wheels keep you firmly in control of your board. Our new, geared, rear-wheel-drive technology is virtually maintenance free, meaning you won't have to worry about alignment issues, chains or belts. Recommended for ages 9 and older and will support a rider up to 220 pounds. The buyer and rider of all Razor Ride-ons are responsible for knowing and obeying all local, state and federal regulations regarding the riding and use of all Razor electric vehicles and scooters.
feature_bullets: Powered by a 125-watt motor, providing lithium-ion-powered electric skateboarding action at speeds up to 10 mph for up to 40 minutes of continuous use
29.7 inch (754 mm) deck length and high quality 5-ply Maple deck deliver a lightweight, responsive ride perfect for cruising
Includes a wireless (2.4 Ghz) remote with wrist strap (replaceable) for variable-speed control of the electrifying carve-and-turn action
Features high-grip urethane wheels and custom reverse kingpin trucks for enhanced stability, perforated grip tape and Geared, rear-wheel drive
Recommended for ages 9 and older and will support a rider up to 220 pounds
